      Methods in net.cloud.server.file.request with parameters of type FileRequestException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void FileRequest.notifyHandleException(FileRequestException ex)
      Notify all threads waiting on this request to complete that it encountered an exception and could not properly be handled.
      If there is a listener attached to this request, it will also be notified of this.
